data.lyric:
[ti:Beautiful]
[ar:王俊凯]
[al:Beautiful]
[by:v_emilylu]

[00:00.00]Beautiful - 王俊凯
[00:00.39]词：Caesar & Loui/Daichi
[00:00.78]曲：Caesar & Loui/Daichi
[00:01.17]编曲：Caesar & Loui@TK Music
[00:01.56]制作人：Caesar & Loui@TK Music
[00:01.96]监唱：曲世聪@shicong fatnunu/吕忠训@锐声音乐
[00:02.35]录音：曲世聪@shicong fatnunu
[00:02.74]混音：Caesar & Loui@TK Music
[00:03.13]母带：Pontus Petersson@TK Music
[00:03.53]Beautiful so beautiful
[00:05.43]
[00:08.17]Come on
[00:09.13]Yeah
[00:09.63]
[00:10.45]Know you have me forever from the start
[00:14.20]
[00:14.78]when I saw you girl you were all that mattered
[00:19.26]want you close enough til my heart surrenders
[00:23.75]I've been waiting for you day and night
[00:26.68]
[00:27.36]I wanna let you know cuz its real
[00:29.68]I wanna make you feel what I feel
[00:31.75]I wanna get to know you make you fall like I do
[00:34.66]cause girl I can tell
[00:36.06]That when I look in your eyes I know its true
[00:38.55]that when your looking at mine it feels so good
[00:40.77]Yeah I wont let you go
[00:42.91]I wanna tell you wanna let you know
[00:44.84]
[00:45.43]You are beautiful so beautiful
[00:49.86]girl you look beautiful to me
[00:53.62]
[00:54.23]You are beautiful so beautiful
[00:58.75]girl you look beautiful to me
[01:02.65]
[01:03.53]Just tell me girl do you feel
[01:05.80]my love so deep is for you
[01:07.93]Say do you feel what I feel
[01:10.50]
[01:11.16]Do do do ya
[01:12.43]I wanna hold you so bad
[01:14.49]We're gonna start a fire
[01:16.91]Say do you feel what I feel
[01:19.83]Do do do ya
[01:21.43]Everything that you're doing to me
[01:23.77]So incredible (aha)
[01:26.07]When you so fine I can not behave
[01:28.24]yeah I lose it all (aha)
[01:30.49]Everytime that you looking at me
[01:32.66]I just can not believe
[01:35.16](can not believe can not believe)
[01:38.76]You are beautiful so beautiful
[01:43.27]girl you look beautiful to me
[01:47.09]
[01:47.60]You are beautiful so beautiful
[01:52.03]girl you look beautiful to me
[01:55.99]
[02:15.02]Your all that I want girl
[02:17.73]
[02:19.17]yeah you're all that I need when I look into your eyes
[02:23.65]When you're standing next to me
[02:26.21]
[02:26.82]Beautiful is what you are girl
[02:34.38]You are beautiful so beautiful
[02:38.74]girl you look beautiful to me
[02:42.36]
[02:43.11]You are beautiful so beautiful
[02:47.66]girl you look beautiful to me
[02:51.42]The way you are
[02:53.49]the way you captivate my soul
[02:55.68]so beautiful
[02:57.98]the way you looking like you do
[03:00.25]The way you are
[03:01.58]
[03:02.44]the way you make me feel so good oh
[03:05.27]Cause you are beautiful to me
data.trans:
[ti:Beautiful]
[ar:王俊凯]
[al:Beautiful]
[by:v_emilylu]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.39]//
[00:00.78]//
[00:01.17]//
[00:01.56]//
[00:01.96]//
[00:02.35]//
[00:02.74]//
[00:03.13]//
[00:03.53]//
[00:08.17]//
[00:09.13]//
[00:10.45]从一开始你就永远的拥有了我
[00:14.78]从我见到你的第一眼开始，一切都不重要了
[00:19.26]想要离你更近，直到我的的心彻底沦陷
[00:23.75]我一直在等你 昼夜更替
[00:27.36]我想让你知道这些都是真的
[00:29.68]我想要让你感同我的身受
[00:31.75]我想了解你更多，我想让你也沉沦
[00:34.66]因为女孩我知道
[00:36.06]当我望进你的双眼，我知道那是真的
[00:38.55]你望向我时我无法抑制的心情
[00:40.77]我不会放你走
[00:42.91]想告诉你 想让你知道
[00:45.43]你是如此美丽
[00:49.86]你在我眼中是如此美丽
[00:54.23]你是如此美丽
[00:58.75]你在我眼中是如此美丽
[01:03.53]告诉我你的感受
[01:05.80]我深沉的爱意将你淹没
[01:07.93]你能感同我的身受吗
[01:11.16]可以吗
[01:12.43]我用尽全身力气想抓紧你
[01:14.49]我们将点燃一簇火
[01:16.91]你能够感同我的身受吗
[01:19.83]可以吗
[01:21.43]你对我所做的一切
[01:23.77]是如此的不可思议
[01:26.07]你的好让我无法自控
[01:28.24]我全盘失控
[01:30.49]每次当你望进我的双眼
[01:32.66]我无法相信
[01:35.16]我还是无法相信
[01:38.75]你是如此美丽
[01:43.27]你在我眼中是如此美丽
[01:47.60]你是如此美丽
[01:52.03]你在我眼中是如此美丽
[02:15.02]你是我想得到的一切
[02:19.17]当我望进你的双眼 我知道你是我想要的一切
[02:23.65]当你近在咫尺
[02:26.82]你就是美丽的具象化
[02:34.38]你是如此美丽
[02:38.74]你在我眼中是如此美丽
[02:43.11]你是如此美丽
[02:47.66]你在我眼中是如此美丽
[02:51.42]你的样子
[02:53.49]你掌控我灵魂的方式
[02:55.68]如此美丽
[02:57.98]你看起来就是你的样子
[03:00.24]你原本的样子
[03:02.44]你的样子 让我感觉美好
[03:05.27]因为你在我眼中是如此美丽
